title: Hazard Data Package
description: A lightweight format that supports the publication, exchange and use of hazard data.

id.title: id
id.description: A globally unique identifier for the package, e.g. a UUID

name.title: name
name.description: A short url-usable name for the package

licenses.title: licenses
licenses.description: The license(s) under which this package is published.

name.title: name
name.description: MUST be an Open Definition license identifier, see http://licenses.opendefinition.org/

path.title: path
path.description: A fully qualified URL, or a POSIX file path..

eventset.title: eventset
eventset.description: An Event Set descriptor, that describes the circumstances in which a hazard occurs

hazard_type.title: hazard_type
hazard_type.description: Identifies the type of hazard. Valid values are defined by the RDL Hazard Type Code list

process_type.title: process_type
process_type.description: Identifies the type of analysis used to generate the Footprints. Valid values are defined by the RDL Process Type Code List

id.title: id
id.description: A globally unique identifier for the package, e.g. a UUID

start_date.title: start date
start_date.description: The datetime at which the modelled scenarios start

end_date.title: end date
end_date.description: The datetime at which the modelled scenarios end

year.title: year
year.description: The reference year to which the modelled scenario refers

time_span.title: time span
time_span.description: The extent of the time period covered by the events included in the current scenario hazard analysis

id.title: id
id.description: A globally unique identifier for the package, e.g. a UUID

calculation_method.title: calculation method
calculation_method.description: A description of how this Event was generated, e.g. observed or simulated. Valid values are defined by the RDL Calculation Method Code List

return_period.title: return period
return_period.description: The probability of the event occuring expressed as an array of return periods ('10', '100', '1000') or as a single String specifying a range (10-1000)

start_date.title: start date
start_date.description: The datetime at which the modelled scenarios start

end_date.title: end date
end_date.description: The datetime at which the modelled scenarios end

hazard_type.title: hazard_type
hazard_type.description: Identifies the type of hazard. Valid values are defined by the RDL Hazard Type Code list

process_type.title: process_type
process_type.description: Identifies the type of analysis used to generate the Footprints. Valid values are defined by the RDL Process Type Code List

event.title: event
event.description: Associates this event with another event. The value should match the value of an id attribute of in the event array.

resources.title: footprints
resources.description: A list of the Hazard Data Package Resources contained in the package.

name.title: name
name.description: An identifier string. Lower case characters with `.`, `_`, `-` and `/` are allowed.

path.title: path
path.description: Provides the file system path, or a remote URL, that provides a location for the resource

mediatype.title: media type
mediatype.description: The media type of this resource. Can be any valid media type listed with [IANA](https://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml).

process_type.title: process_type
process_type.description: The type of hazard process modelled. Valid values for the process_type property are defined by the RDL Process Type Code List

imt.title: imt
imt.description: The intensity measure. Valid values are described in the RDL Intensity Measure code list

event.title: event
event.description: Associates this resource with an event. The value should match the value of an id attribute of in the event array.

epsg.title: epsg
epsg.description: Describes the spatial reference used in the data.

data_uncertainty.title: data_uncertainty
data_uncertainty.description: Comments about the uncertainty of the data
